publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3876 Kenneth Gibson: Congratulations to Arran Fine Foodsâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Arran Fine Foods on winning a bronze award in the spirit category at the recent Napa Valley Mustard Festival worldwide mustard competition, in California, for its Original Arran Mustard with Arran Malt Whisky; notes that Arran Fine Foods have been making luxury condiments for over 30 years, with a strong focus on quality and tradition from locally produced island ingredients; is confident that the innovative team at Paterson Arran Limited, parent company of Arran Fine Foods, led by managing director Alan Hardie, will continue to go from strength to strength, and wishes both Arran Fine Foods and Paterson Arran Limited all the best for the future. Supported by: Rob Gibson*

S3M-3876 Congratulations to Arran Fine Foods (lodged on 6 April 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, John Lamont*, Stuart McMillan*, John Scott*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Bill Kidd*, Alasdair Allan*, Aileen Campbell*, Robin Harper*, Jamie McGrigor*, Cathy Peattie*
S3M-3876 Congratulations to Arran Fine Foods (lodged on 6 April 2009) Annabel Goldie*, Gil Paterson*
